alert.note: Alert for Central Tularosa Basin; Northern Dona Ana County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 4:19PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Otero and east central Dona Ana Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 419 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles southwest of White Sands National Monument, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... White Sands National Monument, Portions of Jornada Experimental Range and Lake Lucero. This includes Highway 70 in New Mexico between mile markers 181 and 184. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Tularosa Basin; Northern Dona Ana County
